cause.description:
I don't have any kids nor do I particularly like people all that much so what do I care if the planet goes to hell. We must run our cars all night in the driveways to emit more exhaust and bring back aerosol sprays. After a certain number of participants have joined, we'll search out Larry David's wife and give her a mini tree.
1. run our air-conditioners 24 hours a day
2. get rid of any natural green spaces i.e. Vondelpark and Central Park
3. drill for more oil everywhere
4. kill tree hugging hippies
cause.mission: Our mission is to increase the temperature of the planet worldwide
cause.name: Kill the Earth
